it.polimi.ingsw.GC_06.model.State

Class GameStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.GC_06.model.State.GameStatus

  • public class GameStatus
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the main status of the game. Contains the current status, the turn of the game and the players order.
